entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 8:10PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Patchy Frost Possible Tonight into Tuesday morning... A cold airmass will settle in across the Tennessee Valley on Tuesday morning. Temperatures are expected to drop down into the mid-30s. If winds relax enough, a few areas could see patchy frost develop. Sheltered valleys are most likely to see conditions conducive for frost. Sensitive vegetation may be susceptible to damage if frost
